body_html: Hi @jspark1105, I think it makes sense for the utility functions to be in FBGEMM, so that FBGEMM is a standalone library that has everything people need. Otherwise, users of FBGEMM might need to take a dependency on PyTorch, which seems less than ideal
body_text: Hi @jspark1105, I think it makes sense for the utility functions to be in FBGEMM, so that FBGEMM is a standalone library that has everything people need. Otherwise, users of FBGEMM might need to take a dependency on PyTorch, which seems less than ideal
body: Hi @jspark1105, I think it makes sense for the utility functions to be in FBGEMM, so that FBGEMM is a standalone library that has everything people need. Otherwise, users of FBGEMM might need to take a dependency on PyTorch, which seems less than ideal
